FuncDef:
The protocol command configures the underlay protocol that advertises BIER information.
The undo protocol command restores the default configuration.
By default, no BIER underlay protocol is configured.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run the protocol command to configure the underlay protocol that advertises BIER information.
Prerequisites
A BIER sub-domain has been configured using the sub-domain command.
